reviews.text: Continues to be a tasty and affordable experience, and their rice gam ehas stablized nicely so we've had only good experiences.  Friendly staff, too!
The food is so delicious! And excellent customer service, very much my go to spot!!!
I have eaten in Asian Bistros from Boston down to Florida. T.J's is the best

Best sushi in town!
Try the Fantastic Roll! üòã
The food and the service really raise the bar
The waitress were very friendly and attentive.

Breath taking! My fav sushi spot to date, and that's saying a lot because I am a Japanese/sushi connoisseur. The service was very friendly and accommodating, very fresh sushi, beef gyoza, tuna tartar, miso soup finished off by the delectable red bean fried ice cream. I have the food delivered all the time and am equally as happy with eating in. The ambience is very cozy and intimate.

üíöLoved the Sushi,( the freshest ever)üç£üç£üç£üç•, Beef Gyoza, Miso Soup, Fried red bean ice cream.!!!  Was there this past Saturday & highly recommend this restaurant!! Great Vibes Customer Serviceüêçüíö
Love TJ! One of our fav lunch spots. Good food and good value üëçüëç

Well the sushi and sashimi are great love it, it feels fresh and original, but other dishes look just plain. The service was great but the ambient looks simple. Yet still I will recommend it because I went for the sushi and it wasn't disappointing
Best sushi spot in Sunnyside, imo
I love it here small and cozy. Didn't have a wait got served  quickly. Food was delicious. Over all I had a great time. The price was not bad at all.

Was here for dinner in late May before heading into Manhattan for a show. We used to be regulars, but have not gone in a couple of years. Not sure if they have gone through a management change, but we definitely noticed a decline in service and the quality of the food. My husband and I both experienced unpleasant after effects. With only a few tables, they were also rushing us out  when it started to get crowded.  Disappointed.
Our go to for some time now. They changed the bentonite boxes for plates but with sections
Great food, beautiful presentation. Clean and quiet. Decent  lunch and Dinner special prices.
One of the best Japanese restaurants in all of New York City. It's worth the trip to Queens to experience this culinary delight.
TJ‚Äôs might have the best lunch specials in Woodside. Great rolls and Bento.
Best sushi spot in the neighborhood
Ped√≠ un Sashimi y venia con menos que el amor de mi ex. Deb√≠ pedir otra cosa.
Delicious food and wonderful atmosphere, I received a rose here from our server as well since it was Valentine‚Äôs Day which was very sweet
Very affordable, timely, and delicious take out. They care about their customers. The sushi platter was generous with their portions.
Had delicious 3 roll sushi lunch special with a large hot sake.
The best sushi üç£.. I Love this Resturant.
excellent‚Ä¶..
Great place, friendly service and the food was very good. Very fair pricing too.
Best sushi in NYC!
The rolls are absolutely FIRE

The food and staff here are top tier! Im so lucky to have this place within walking distance. The sushi is always fresh and delicious. The staff is kind and accommodating. The kitchen food is nothing to sleep on either. If you are unsure of what to get don't worry, whatever you order will hit the spot!
Food and service were incredible
Great service, good for accommodating large groups too. Menu has a variety of different foods. Everything was pretty standard, just your typical sushi.
The food was great and came out quickly.  The service was great!!
Excellent food and staff
The sushi rolls is good,  good price with lunch menu
Had the Chicken Teriyaki Bento Box, delicious and filling

My 2nd favorite sushi joint in Queens.
Cozy atmosphere and awesome food makes for a good time.
Amazing food, very very reasonable price, and amazing service. 100p would recommend
Takeaway
De todo mi gusto, para m√≠ concepci√≥n el mejor de queens.
This is our go to place in Queens, it is one of the best in Queens.

What a fabulous neighborhood spot for fresh fish. I ordered the sashimi lunch and was blown out of the sea. My 15 pcs of fish slid down nicely with a free glass of ice water (rare for New York). Please go visit my friends at TJ‚Äôs for a great meal with some delicious fish.
La comida es deliciosa!!!, tienen muy buenos precios y el lugar es muy tranquilo. üëåüèΩ recomendado
Perfect food! Fresh! Good wine ! Will be back for sure ! üç£
This place has some of the best sushi I‚Äôve ever had the pleasure of having.
Whether you‚Äôre a sushi lover or want a dish with rice this place has something for everyone

We often order from here for delivery because they are mindful of allergies. We came in for my daughter‚Äòs birthday with a number of teenagers and they were amazing, helpful, friendly, and the food was great.  Really glad that TJs is a part of the neighborhood.

Amazing experience! TJ's has been recommended quite a few times by locals in the neighborhood. I finally got to go and it did not disappoint! Great food, great drinks, and great service. Will definitely be coming back!

As delicious, cozy, classy and friendly as I remember. A jewel of Sunnyside. - 5/30/2024 review

Great sushi, fun menu and great atmosphere. I come here once a month (minimum). - 6 years ago review
Me and my family have been going to TJ for years. Great service and delicious food!

I love it here! The staff is always so nice and attentive. The food is fantastic. Any dish I have ever ordered was very delicious. They have outdoor dining right now so you can enjoy this place tonight!

Tasty sushi and great service!
They have interesting roll combinations.
I felt great after eating, meaning the quality is top notch ‚ù§Ô∏è Thank you!
I LOVED their miso soup, very tasty and wholesome. I felt healed and ready for anything New York would throw at me.

Love the food! For now my fav spot for sushi in LIC and queens! Price is really good, quality of the fish is great and personal is very friendly!
We are at the bar, actually loved it better than a table.

Sushi in Sunnyside Gardens
After trying a few places in Queens these past 8 months, I found a little gem TJ Asian - 50th & Skillman

In case you didn‚Äôt notice lol I loveee Salmon ! It was very fresh.   Miso soup came with my salmon platter, even on a hot summer day I still enjoed‚Ä¶ I LOVE Agedashi d≈çfu, it was perfectly made and paired with a not to salty sauce. Dessert was also delicious, I had the fried banana with red bean ice cream.. THE POUR - PLUM WINE

The only issue I had was my waitress for got me . I had to ask other wait staff for water, dessert and my bill and never asked if I wanted anything else.

I am a person who loves Asian food, I eat sushi at least once a week and when I moved to this neighborhood and saw the reviews of this restaurant I knew I had to try it.

I ordered the avocado bomb to start and as a main course I ordered two maki rolls, the electric roll and the kamikaze roll, I was speechless, it was so delicious that I finished everything in less than 5 minutes.

It is my new favorite restaurant for dinner and for ordering deliveries.

Had a lovely lunch here.  TJ Asian Bistro is a lovely, warm space.  The decor is simple but charming.  Service is excellent and the food is very good.  Their lunch special is a real bargain.  The Green Tea ice cream was üòã and two people can share it.

As always on a late lunch date with my husband on a Friday evening! We unexpectedly stopped by to enjoy some sushi. We decided to dine in since the weather was cold and no other person was inside either. I have to say the host was very warm and welcoming to us. He made us feel very comfortable and took every possible measure to maintain 6ft distance from us when taking our order and serving our meals. We ordered a soft crab shell which was a great starter because we were hungry. We shared this hot appetizer  amongst us two. Then came our 2 special rolls, which were the ‚ÄúAmazing Roll‚Äù and the second one was ‚ÄúSpecial Kaye Roll‚Äù! Both were freshly made and the taste was to its perfection. We enjoyed these rolls with eel sauce! My husband enjoyed sparkling water and I enjoyed their Japanese  home made tea. The tea was nicely hot and went perfect with our sushi rolls. I am a tea lover and rarely enjoy outside home teas but their tea was really great in taste.no desserts for us. We were full with all this food.  A must go SUSHI SPOT FOR ANY ONE LOOKING TO enjoy A QUIET PLACE WITH GREAT TASTE AND FRESHLY MADE üç£ sushi!

Best sushi spot in Queens area. Been living in Sunnyside for the past 6years and i come here pretty often. It is a small place indeed, but very personable and intimate. Large menu with great variety of rolls, soups, appetizers, small bites.‚Ä¶

We enjoyed our dining experience at TJ Asian Bistro. The food is excellent -- the sushi is fresh and tasty, and the tempura was perfect. The service is also wonderful and servers are polite and responsive. Thank you!

From the 5 star service to the fresh and amazing quality of the sushi. Extremely delicious and superb staff with really amazing personalities. From the moment we sat down to the last piece we ate. Excellent. Highly recommend!

This place is like my second home! Me and my hubby love it! Every time we go we discover a new addiction! The service is soooo nice and they are so warming and welcoming !! I‚Äôm never let down by the chefs!!! I love love their miso soup and‚Ä¶

I was in the mood for Sunday night sushi at home and my usual fav sushi place was closed so I went with TJ Asian Bistro based on reviews and I was not disappointed with the sushi rolls I got for me and the family (also this was a delivery order)and we waited about an hour.
Both spicy crab and shrimp tempura were fresh, tasty & delicious, the shrimp gyoza order was also of our liking & I feel the prices are affordable, I would like to try other dishes in the menu in the future.

Great first date place.  Venue is clean and has a romantic feel with red roses and dimmed lighting.  The have a wide range of wines and even bring the white chilled next to your table.

Food was great, but the presentation was outstanding.

Ordered, hidden mango,  fried tuna, and a few other dishes.

I like this place a lot, I usually come here for the lunch special. It‚Äôs consistently good. For 13$ you get a miso ginger salad, soup, dumplings, a California roll, rice an entree, all in a cool clean and relaxed environment.
This is one of the better neighborhood spots, Sunnyside has great food. TJ Asian Bistro is great for a quick and tasty lunch.

Nice and cozy Japanese restaurant in Sunny Side. I would recommend this restaurant which is our food‚Äôs quite tasty and nicely manager and staffs. I will come back again soon to try another foods. Thumb‚Äôs up üòé
A nice place for rolls, sushi, and tempura. The service is good and the servers are very nice. I recommend this place completely. Can get busy on weekends since it is a semi small restaurant.
Food and service is very good. Great selection.  Authentic Japanese food

It's a nice friendly neighborhood restaurant and they offer good prices for their food. Not only can you sit in they also do free delivery (if you live nearby). I love their house special friend rice that has a mix of everything. Their‚Ä¶

This place is amazing ü§©! I think it's the best at Woodside. Besides the excellent food, it's clean and has good service! The price is worth it, you won't regret it. As it was my first time here, I tried a Dinner Bento Box that included a Beef Negimaki portion... made by Gods!
Amazing food for very good prices. Ordered the duck fried rice, hot California roll, shrimp tempura, and I believe the special roll was dynamite.

Super tasty sushi !
Great service , had a great time
Everything was impressive. King crab ( Naruto) Fantastic Roll, and special kaye Ro recommended.  Need to work little on Tempura yet deserve a 5star  for overall. Thumbs up to the service.
The food was absolutely delicious.  The staff were very polite and welcoming.
The sushi is great, tastes amazing and the prices are reasonably.  I highly recommend
Great sushi & service. nice vibe. Lunch special is available every day
Food is always good, never disappointed!!

A friend and I met here for lunch and had a great time. We found street parking with no issues. However, I could see parking being an issue during busy hours. The staff were amazing, very attentive, and welcoming. I was shocked at how busy it was around 1:30pm, which was a good sign that the food was good.

They have an extensive Asian/sushi menu, including a separate lunch special menu. We both ordered the lunch special that included a soup, small salad and option of meat, rice, and a sushi/California roll. I don't eat seafood, so I ordered the cucumber roll, and my friend had the avocado roll. This was my first time eating three cucumber rolls, and surprisingly, it was tasty. I enjoyed my entire meal, and it was fulfilling. I was able to take a small to go bag of my rice and teriyaki chicken. My friend ate all of hers and we were both satisfied with our meal and the service. We both enjoyed our refills of the hot tea throughout our meal, and you had the option of water as well.

This is definitely a cool spot to check out, and I would definitely return to check out some other menu items.

This is my favorite sushi place for years‚Ä¶

PRO and Honest Review:

Food is always fresh and of awesome quality.

Waiters are always attentive and quick.

Cleanliness and smell is top-notch. Bathrooms are stocked and well taken care of.

Prices are reasonable.

No complaints here: I definitely recommend this spot.

5 STAR Well-earned!!
cute presentation, nice service! Sushi was not bad but not the freshest I‚Äôve had. Decent prices!
